title: Vorticity blowup in 2D compressible Euler equations
authors: Jiajie Chen, Giorgio Cialdea, Steve Shkoller, Vlad Vicol
abstract:
We prove finite-time vorticity blowup for smooth solutions of the 2D
compressible Euler equations with smooth, localized, and non-vacuous initial
data. The vorticity blowup occurs at the time of the first singularity, and is
accompanied by an axisymmetric implosion in which the swirl velocity enjoys
full stability, as opposed to finite co-dimension stability.
